name: Drum & Bass & Bullets
description:
Game made for Bullet Hell Game Jam 2.

You are an antivirus trying to rescue your computer from corruption. Shoot your way through to save the corrupted data.

If you don't want to play the tutorial, here are the controls (controller support tested on XONE controller):

- Move with WASD  / Left Analog

- Shoot with Arrow Keys / Right Analog

- Slow down move speed for precise movement with Shift / Right Trigger

I couldn't make a HTML version because Unity DOTS screwes everything up when it's in HTML.
